data.title: Is it true that Guns N' Roses recorded a song while Axl was making love?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 2): Yes, it's true. The song was “Rocket Queen", the last track on 1987’s Appetite for Destruction.

One of Axl's bandmates had his girlfriend in the studio while the band was recording “Rocket Queen.” I believe it was drummer Steven Adler's girlfriend. Axl was attracted to her, and ...
